title: Stablecoins: Unlocking a Trillion-Dollar Future in Global Payments by 2030
body: BitcoinWorld Stablecoins: Unlocking a Trillion-Dollar Future in Global Payments by 2030 Imagine a world where sending money across borders is as easy and fast as sending an email. This future is closer than you think, thanks to stablecoins . A groundbreaking report from Keyrock and Bitso projects that these digital assets could power a significant portion of global payments by 2030, transforming how we conduct international business and personal transactions. What’s Driving the Stablecoin Surge in Global Payments? The joint report suggests that stablecoins might account for an astonishing 12% of global cross-border payments, equivalent to about $1 trillion, within the next six years. This marks a substantial leap from under 3% in 2024. But what exactly fuels this optimistic projection? Efficiency: Stablecoins offer faster and cheaper transactions compared to traditional banking systems, especially for international transfers. Accessibility: They provide financial services to unbanked or underbanked populations worldwide. Innovation: Ongoing technological advancements are making stablecoin transactions more seamless and secure. This rapid growth hinges on crucial improvements in market infrastructure, including enhanced liquidity and greater interoperability between different blockchain networks. Clearly, the path to widespread global payments adoption is becoming clearer. The Pivotal Role of Crypto Regulation and Innovation Analysts emphasize that significant growth in the stablecoin sector largely depends on a clearer regulatory landscape. Fortunately, progress is already visible. Jurisdictions like the U.S. and Europe are actively working to establish comprehensive crypto regulation frameworks, which will provide much-needed clarity and confidence for institutions and users alike. Moreover, innovation within the industry is accelerating. Major players are not just participating; they are actively shaping the future. Companies like Tether and Circle, along with various fintechs and established banks, are expanding their presence. Some are even launching their own proprietary blockchains to capture more transaction value and offer tailored solutions. For instance, Circle recently introduced its Arc blockchain, while Tether operates Plasma and Stable, showcasing a commitment to advancing the underlying technology. Unlocking the Potential of Cross-Border Payments The promise of cross-border payments powered by stablecoins is immense. Think about businesses making international supplier payments without delays or high fees, or individuals sending remittances to family members overseas in minutes rather than days. This efficiency can unlock significant economic opportunities globally. Reduced Costs: Lower transaction fees benefit both senders and receivers. Faster Settlements: Near-instant transactions improve cash flow for businesses. Increased Transparency: Blockchain’s immutable ledger provides a clear audit trail. However, challenges remain. Ensuring robust security, managing potential systemic risks, and achieving widespread user adoption are key hurdles. Addressing these concerns will be vital for stablecoins to fully realize their potential in the international payment landscape. Major Players and Future Digital Currency Adoption The active involvement of industry giants underscores the growing belief in the future of digital currency adoption . Firms like Tether and Circle are leading the charge, but traditional financial institutions are also exploring how to integrate stablecoins into their offerings. This convergence of traditional finance and decentralized technology is creating a powerful ecosystem. As regulatory clarity improves and technological innovations continue, we can expect stablecoins to become an increasingly integral part of the global financial system. Their ability to bridge the gap between traditional fiat currencies and the speed of blockchain technology makes them uniquely positioned to revolutionize how money moves around the world. The journey to 12% of global payments by 2030 is ambitious but achievable. With continued innovation, a supportive regulatory environment, and growing confidence from users and institutions, stablecoins are poised to redefine international finance, making transactions faster, cheaper, and more accessible for everyone. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is a stablecoin? A stablecoin is a type of cryptocurrency designed to maintain a stable value, typically pegged to a fiat currency like the US dollar, or to a commodity like gold, to minimize price volatility. Q2: How do stablecoins improve global payments? Stablecoins offer faster transaction speeds, lower fees, and greater accessibility for international transfers compared to traditional banking methods, especially for cross-border payments. Q3: What role does regulation play in stablecoin growth? Clear and consistent crypto regulation provides legal certainty, enhances consumer protection, and builds trust, which is essential for institutional adoption and broader market growth. Q4: Which companies are major players in the stablecoin space? Key players include Tether (USDT) and Circle (USDC), along with various fintech companies and traditional banks exploring or launching their own stablecoin-related services and blockchains. Q5: What are the main challenges for stablecoin adoption? Challenges include ensuring robust security, managing liquidity, achieving interoperability between different blockchain networks, and addressing potential systemic risks. Did you find this article insightful? Share it with your network and help spread the word about the exciting future of stablecoins in global payments! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping digital currency adoption and its future impact on blockchain technology . This post Stablecoins: Unlocking a Trillion-Dollar Future in Global Payments by 2030 first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: ETHZilla (180 Life Sciences) Pivots To Ethereum Treasury Strategy
body: Summary 180 Life Sciences has changed its name to ETHZILLA and it has changed its business plan to an ethereum treasury strategy. The company now holds 82,186 ETH and has entered into partnerships to earn income from it. ATNF stock price is up 312% over the last year, mostly due to the news of the pivot and new ETH holdings. I rate ATNF as a Hold for now as the new strategy goes into effect and the current rally subsides. ETHZILLA (180 Life Sciences) Overview 180 Life Sciences ( ATNF ), now known as ETHZILLA, has changed its overall strategy and business operations. The bioscience drug research and drug discovery company is entering the crypto ecosystem with an entirely new strategy. The company has support from big crypto players for its new operations. The company recently acquired a large amount of Ethereum. It is important to consider the company’s valuation with these new assets. To date, the company has not received any meaningful revenues because its work has been clinical research and drug trials. The crypto treasury has just been established, so the company will continue to receive zero revenues. The difference is that the company will produce investment income from its ETH holdings. I will describe below the company’s new business strategy and attempt to make a new valuation of the stock price with the new assets being considered. The risks are higher, but the company also has a more profitable model before it. For now, I will say the stock price is overvalued based on current assets. I rate the stock as a Hold and recommend investors watch developments from the company. I covered ETHZILLA f/k/a180 Life Science in April 2021 on Seeking Alpha. My previous rating and analysis no longer apply to the company. Even though ETHZILLA still has biotech assets, it does not in its recent Q10 give any updates about what it is doing with the remaining assets. It does say that it is still looking for way to profit from the assets or sell them. As of the last quarterly earnings, the company still reported research costs on its income statement and operating costs. Online Blockchain Casino The company states in its Q10 filing that it has acquired certain assets from Elray . The company acquired licensed patents and a gaming technology platform from Elray in 2024. The assets amount to the key components of creating an online blockchain casino. Elray received stock shares and warrants for the transaction and will help ETHZILLA build and launch the casino. There have been no updates from ETHZILLA about the implementation of these assets or building a casino. It is assumed the system will play some role in the company’s new strategy as being an ETH treasury. Pivot to Ethereum Treasury Strategy The new ETH treasury strategy comes with a new name for the company, ETHZILLA. The company will use its new capital to build an Ethereum treasury vehicle. The strategy is similar to BitMine ( BMNR ) and Strategy ( MSTR ), where the company holds a large amount of different crypto currency and raises proceeds to buy more. They raise proceeds through different debt instruments and loans. ETHZILLA is taking its own approach and has the backing of Peter Thiel, who invested in the company and other crypto treasury strategies . As of August 12, the Ethzilla holds 82,186 Ether ( ETH ) and Ether equivalents, which is worth around $349 million. With the recent Ether rally, the holdings are now worth $373.72 million. In addition to these holdings, the company has $238 million in cash and equivalents. The company has put Electric Capital in charge of its holdings to generate yield. ETHZILLA expects the ETH strategy to generate higher yields than traditionally staking ETH. Rather, the management of assets will gain through a combination of staking, lending, loaning, and private agreements. The company’s ETH treasury will have a group of advisors beyond Electric Capital. The company will partner with Etherealize and its strategic partners. Etherealize and its group of DeFi partners will act as a council for Ethzilla and advise on how to generate proceeds through the Ethereum ecosystem. ATNF Stock - New Valuation The new ETH assets are not reflected in the company’s last earnings release because they were bought afterward. We can imagine the changes to the balance sheet after the assets have been added. Here is a chart of the company’s historical earnings and valuation before the new assets. Amounts in US$ Millions Q2-2025 Q1-2025 Q4-2024 Q3-2023 Q2-2024 Revenues - - - - - Total Operating Expenses 1.7 2.4 1.4 1.0 1.8 Operating Income (1.7) (2.4) (1.4) (1.0) (1.8) Net Income (1.7) (2.4) (4.3) (0.8) 0.0 Cash & ST Investments 2.2 3.7 4.6 0.2 1.1 Total Current Assets 3.1 4.0 5.1 1.2 2.3 Total Assets 10.7 11.7 12.8 10.5 3.9 Accounts Payable 3.3 3.0 2.6 2.7 2.9 Total Current Liabilities 5.3 3.9 3.5 6.4 4.0 Total Liabilities 5.3 3.9 3.5 637 4.3 Book Value / Share $0.89 NAV per Share $0.03 Current Price / Share $7.61 Market Cap 1,650 Total EV 1,650 Data from Seeking Alpha. As of the last Q10, the company reported total debt of $762 thousand. The debt is mostly associated with the purchase of assets and patents from Elray. Current assets outweigh liabilities, but cash is low. At the current rate, cash burn through operations is an issue. The current stock price is way above the company’s book value per share and NAV value per share. The stock price has gained 312% over the last year. Most of the gains occurred this month over news of the pivot and from private placement. The high market cap reflects the high stock price. We now reimagine the balance sheet to include the company’s current ETH holdings and new cash on hand. Its ETH is now worth $373.72 million and the company has $238 million in cash and equivalents. Assets would now be $667.42 million and NAV per share would be $4.29 per share, assuming no further liabilities. The current stock price of $7.61 per share is far above $4.29 per share. The stock price is overvalued at the moment, thus the Hold rating. Comparison to Peers The new ETH treasury strategy for the company has few details on how it will proceed. Strategy ( MSTR ) has been very successful with its bitcoin ( BTC ) treasury strategy. Other companies like Gamestop ( GME ) and Trump Media and Technology Group ( DJT ) are trying similar strategies. There are not many publicly traded companies which have done it. Bitmine ( BMNR ) holds over $2.9 billion ETH and plans to have a treasury. Crypto has seen huge gains over the last year. Bitcoin ( BTC ) is up 102% over the last year and ethereum is up 73% over the last year. Blockchains offer new ecosystems for using these coins as investment tools and debt instruments, like staking. Online gaming and other online ecosystems use blockchains and tokens to run. This environment of using the token allows for the price of it to rise. If you are new to this technology, consider that bitcoin and ethereum can be used to buy things and those purchases are done on the blockchains associated with the currency. The blockchains support different environments which use the tokens, including investment platforms, mining platforms, gaming platforms, NFT platforms, and gambling platforms. The blockchain and its currency have an ecosystem which allows for many different transactions. Risk and Investment Strategy ETHZILLA is at moderate to high risk of poor financial performance. The risk will be less when the company can show either revenues or investment income on a consistent basis. The company’s strategy is innovative and profitable. The technology is new and upcoming. We have to see if ETH treasuries produce the same gains at BTC treasuries. A Hold rating for the company comes at a moderate to high risk. The stock price has recently rallied and is now cooling down or decreasing. There is no revenue for the company and no promise of revenue anytime soon. The company has a higher valuation now and that would be one reason for the stock price to rally. It will be important to read over the company’s next earnings report and especially its balance sheet. Conclusion 180 Life Sciences is now ETHZILLA. The business strategy has changed to an ETH treasury strategy. The company has partnerships with which it will try to gain income from using its new ETH holdings. ETHZILLA also acquired an online gambling platform, but it is unclear what they are doing with it. The company still has its biotech patents and research, but there are no updates. The new business strategy is interesting. As we watch the company implement it, I rate the company as a Hold.

title: BTC Hits New ATH, ETH Pushes Higher as Trump-Putin Meeting Grabs Spotlight: Your Weekly Crypto Recap
body: It was another historic week for the cryptocurrency market as bitcoin, as well as a few altcoins, managed to chart fresh peaks. But let’s begin with the largest digital asset. Just last week, its price struggled to maintain above $117,000 and even dipped below that level on a couple of occasions. However, it had a solid weekend in which it added a few grand and jumped toward $119,000. The beginning of the current business week was a lot more promising. On Monday alone, the cryptocurrency spiked above $122,000 to mark a multi-week peak before the bears returned and pushed it south by over three grand. However, the culmination was yet to occur as the bulls initiated a spectacular leg up on Wednesday and Thursday morning, driving bitcoin above its July 2025 all-time high of $123,200 to a new one. This time, the asset peaked at $124,500. Following this explosive price jump, though, came the almost inevitable correction. BTC quickly dropped back down to $122,000 and $121,000, but that was just the start. The hot PPI data for July came out, with numbers surging to a three-year high, which had an immediate impact on bitcoin’s price. Within minutes, the asset dumped to under $118,000, taking the rest of the market with it, which resulted in nearly $1 billion worth of liquidations. Although it has recovered some ground since then, BTC is still below $119,000. More volatility is expected later today as Donald Trump is set to meet with Vladimir Putin to discuss a possible peace deal between Russia and Ukraine. Ethereum also had a big week, surging to its highest level since 2021 of over $4,700. However, it couldn’t push further to break its all-time high of almost $4,900, unlike BNB, which set a new record at $865 . Other notable weekly gainers include SOL, HYPE, LINK, and ADA. Market Data Weekly Market Overview: Source: QuantifyCrypto Market Cap: $4.110T | 24H Vol: $236B | BTC Dominance: 57.5% BTC: $118,665 (+1.5%) | ETH: $4,640 (+18%) | XRP: $3.12 (-6.5%) This Week’s Crypto Headlines You Can’t Miss A Modest One: Saylor’s Strategy Buys 155 BTC for $18 Million . The week began with a few modest bitcoin purchases from some of the well-known names. Strategy accumulated 155 BTC for $18 million, while Metaplanet outshone it with a 518 BTC addition, purchased for over $61 million. Bitcoin Dominance Drops Below 60% as Altseason Signals Flash . The metric comparing BTC’s market share against all other cryptocurrencies has dropped significantly in the past month or so, going from 62% to under 58%. According to analysts, this hints at the start of the long-anticipated altseason. Terraform’s Do Kwon Pleads Guilty to Its Collapse . Terraform Labs’ CEO, Do Kwon, who repeatedly claimed he was not responsible for the multi-billion-dollar collapse, has finally pleaded guilty. He will forfeit $19 million in proceeds while he awaits the sentencing in December 2025. Is the Bull Cycle Nearing Its Top? Here’s What Bitcoin NUPL Metric Says . As BTC registered another all-time high week above $124,000 and crashed shortly after, analysts were quick to speculate whether this bull cycle has run its course or there are more gains ahead. Here’s what the bitcoin NUPL metric had to say about this . Coinbase Closes Deribit Deal as Crypto Derivatives Skyrocket . After a few months of speculations, Coinbase announced the official acquisition of the world’s largest crypto options exchange – Deribit. Coinbase’s President and COO described it as the “biggest deal in crypto history.” Ethereum Exit Queue Heating up Again: 808,880 ETH Worth $3.7B Held Up . Validators rushing to exit or enter the staking part of Ethereum’s ecosystem have clogged the network as the queue has rocketed to over 800,000 ETH, valued at $3.7 billion at today’s prices. Charts This week, we have a chart analysis of Ethereum, Ripple, Cardano, Solana, and Hyperliquid – click here for the complete price analysis . title: DeFi Development Bolsters Solana (SOL) Holdings with Astounding $22M Acquisition
body: BitcoinWorld DeFi Development Bolsters Solana (SOL) Holdings with Astounding $22M Acquisition In a significant move that underscores growing institutional confidence in the digital asset space, DeFi Development Corp., an AI-powered online platform, recently announced a substantial acquisition. The company has secured an additional 110,000 Solana (SOL) tokens, valued at an impressive $22 million. This strategic expansion further solidifies their position in the rapidly evolving world of crypto investment , bringing their total digital asset holdings to approximately 1,420,173 SOL and SOL equivalents. This bold step highlights the increasing integration of sophisticated blockchain technology within traditional financial strategies. What Propels DeFi Development’s Solana (SOL) Strategy? DeFi Development Corp.’s latest acquisition of 110,000 SOL tokens is more than just a purchase; it is a clear indicator of their long-term vision. This addition brings their total Solana portfolio to an estimated value of $273 million. Such substantial holdings reflect a strong belief in the future potential of the Solana ecosystem and its underlying blockchain technology. The company’s commitment to Solana is not new. Earlier in July, DeFi Development successfully completed a $122.5 million convertible bond issuance. The primary purpose of this significant funding was to fuel further SOL purchases, demonstrating a calculated and aggressive approach to expanding their digital asset holdings. Strategic Accumulation: The consistent acquisition of Solana (SOL) tokens positions DeFi Development Corp. as a major player in the Solana ecosystem. Long-Term Vision: These moves suggest a belief in the sustained growth and utility of the Solana blockchain. Funding Innovation: The bond issuance provides ample capital for continued crypto investment and expansion. Understanding Solana (SOL) and its Role in Blockchain Technology Solana (SOL) stands out in the cryptocurrency landscape due to its high throughput and low transaction costs, powered by innovative blockchain technology. It is a favorite among developers for building decentralized applications (dApps) and various DeFi protocols. Currently, CoinMarketCap reports SOL trading at $193.67, experiencing a minor dip of 0.24% over the past 24 hours. Despite minor fluctuations, its robust infrastructure continues to attract significant interest from institutional investors like DeFi Development Corp. Investing in Solana provides DeFi Development with exposure to a dynamic and rapidly expanding segment of the blockchain space. This strategic decision aligns with the company’s focus on AI-powered platforms, as Solana’s efficiency can support complex computational needs often associated with AI applications in finance. How Are Digital Asset Holdings Shaping the Future of Crypto Investment? The trend of companies accumulating significant digital asset holdings , particularly in established cryptocurrencies like Solana (SOL), signifies a maturation of the crypto market. It moves beyond speculative trading to strategic corporate treasury management and long-term investment. This shift is crucial for the mainstream adoption of blockchain technology. For businesses like DeFi Development , holding substantial amounts of a foundational cryptocurrency like SOL offers several advantages: Diversification: Adds a new class of assets to traditional portfolios. Growth Potential: Positions the company to benefit from the growth of the blockchain and DeFi sectors. Operational Utility: Potentially leverages the underlying blockchain for its own AI-powered platform operations. This approach to crypto investment is becoming a blueprint for other forward-thinking entities looking to integrate digital assets into their core strategies. It reflects a growing confidence in the stability and utility of these innovative technologies. What’s Next for DeFi Development and Solana (SOL)? DeFi Development Corp.’s continued expansion of its Solana (SOL) holdings signals a clear trajectory. The company is not merely observing the market; it is actively participating and shaping it through significant capital deployment. This commitment reinforces the growing narrative of institutional confidence in the broader digital asset space. As blockchain technology continues to evolve, we can expect more entities to follow similar strategic paths, driving further innovation and adoption. The current market dynamics for SOL, while showing minor daily fluctuations, remain strong within a broader upward trend, supporting the long-term investment thesis. DeFi Development ‘s moves serve as a compelling example of how AI-powered platforms are leveraging digital assets for strategic growth and enhanced financial positioning. Summary: DeFi Development Corp. has made a bold move by acquiring an additional $22 million worth of Solana (SOL), significantly boosting its digital asset holdings to $273 million. This strategic crypto investment, funded in part by a $122.5 million convertible bond issuance, underscores the company’s strong belief in Solana’s blockchain technology and its role in the future of finance. This aggressive accumulation positions DeFi Development as a key player, highlighting a growing trend of institutional engagement in the evolving digital asset landscape. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is DeFi Development Corp.? A: DeFi Development Corp. is an AI-powered online platform that focuses on various aspects of decentralized finance and actively invests in digital assets. Q2: Why is DeFi Development investing heavily in Solana (SOL)? A: The company’s significant investment in Solana (SOL) reflects its belief in Solana’s robust blockchain technology, high transaction speeds, low costs, and its potential for growth within the DeFi ecosystem. Q3: How much Solana (SOL) does DeFi Development now hold in total? A: Following its latest acquisition, DeFi Development Corp. now holds approximately 1,420,173 SOL and SOL equivalents, valued at roughly $273 million. Q4: What is a convertible bond issuance, and how did it relate to this acquisition? A: A convertible bond issuance is a type of debt instrument that can be converted into a predetermined number of shares or assets. DeFi Development Corp. used a $122.5 million convertible bond issuance to fund further purchases of Solana (SOL), demonstrating a strategic financial maneuver. Q5: What is the broader significance of this acquisition for the crypto market? A: This acquisition signifies a growing trend of institutional confidence and strategic crypto investment in established digital assets, moving beyond speculative trading towards long-term corporate treasury management and the integration of blockchain technology into core business strategies. title: ICO, NFT and RWA – How Crypto Hype Cycles Evolve
body: The history of the crypto market is one of trends, which leaves investors breathless, skyrockets valuation and then, inevitably, goes cold until the next trend hits the market. Whether it is the wild fundraising days of Initial Coin Offerings (ICOs) to the cultural mania of Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) and now the institutional adoption of Real-World Assets (RWAs), each hype cycle made a significant impact on the industry. This evolution shows how blockchain has matured – from a raw, experimental playground to a regulated, efficiency-driven financial layer. And while each phase has brought its share of winners and losers, investors continue searching for the “next big thing” that could deliver massive returns, much like how MAGACOIN FINANCE is now drawing attention as a new contender in the current bull market. The ICO Era ICOs took over headlines between 2017 and 2018. Under the influence of Ethereum smart contracts, projects avoided the established channels to find funding and sold their tokens directly to investors worldwide. The articulation was straightforward, pitch a token which holds value in the next revolutionary dApp before launching. Billions came in, even on projects little more than a whitepaper. The hype and FOMO caused valuations to go to the stratosphere and back in reality, valuations dropped rapidly. Regulatory clampdowns came and only a small percentage of ICO projects remained intact. Nevertheless, ICOs demonstrated the success of on-chain fundraising, which led to other subsequent models such as the IEO and IDO. A Strategic Investment in Today’s Market Although in improving hype cycles, in the past, retail speculation has fueled a hype cycle, MAGACOIN FINANCE is setting it in a more sustainable model. Being supported by constant progress and a growing ecosystem, it is gaining the deserved reputation of a security-certified, audited, long-term project. Participants notably already witnessed significant momentum early on, and as spots in the allocations are becoming less available, the interest is growing before broader access to the exchanges can be reached. The chance resembles the initial days of other breakout tokens – when a little investment can multiply a number of times, lеading to incredible gains. NFTs Era By 2021, the spotlight shifted from utility tokens to ownership. NFTs, backed by blockchain certificates, let people own unique pieces of digital art, collectibles, and in-game assets. Beeple’s $69 million sale and celebrity endorsements pushed NFTs into pop culture overnight. The speculative rush sent prices of top collections soaring before the bubble popped. Most collections lost nearly all their value, but the technology itself endured. Today, NFTs are finding real-world use cases in ticketing, authentication, and gaming, proving the underlying innovation had substance beyond the hype. RWAs Era Now, attention has turned to Real-World Asset tokenization. This is not about creating speculative crypto-native products – it’s about bringing tangible assets like real estate, bonds, and private credit onto the blockchain. Wall Street giants like BlackRock and Franklin Templeton are leading the market, seeking efficiency, liquidity, and transparency. The interest among institutions is evident, since these tokens are pegged in real assets, and hence the volatility is reduced, which fits into the compliance requirements. There are still hurdles to overcome, primarily around legal structures and cross-border rules and regulations but as regulatory sandboxes are implemented in countries, the road to large-scale adoption is becoming clear. Conclusion From ICOs to NFTs and now RWAs, each crypto hype cycle has built on the lessons of the last. The industry is moving from speculative mania toward a more grounded, utility-focused future. MAGACOIN FINANCE fits into this evolution by offering a secure, growth-oriented ecosystem that combines innovation with credibility – making it a project to watch as the market’s next chapter unfolds. title: Hyperliquid price forecast: Can it break past $50 as it sets a new ATH?
body: Hyperliquid’s native token, HYPE, is pressing against its ceiling again as platform activity explodes to fresh records. Moreover, the token now trades a whisker below July’s all-time high, which keeps traders focused on a decisive break over the $50 mark. The question is not whether momentum exists, but whether it can carry price through resistance and hold. Record activity lifts sentiment On August 15, Hyperliquid posted a new platform record with $29 billion in 24-hour trading volume and $7.7 million in fees. Hyperliquid @HyperliquidX · Follow Hyperliquid reached new all-time highs with $29B in 24h volume and $7.7M in 24h fees. 8:25 AM · Aug 15, 2025 1.5K Reply Copy link Read 197 replies Moreover, HYPE hovered around $48.57 as of press time, which put it roughly 1.1% below the $49.75 peak set on July 14. Because price sits so close to that milestone, sentiment has turned more assertive, and dip buyers remain active within the day’s $44.40–$49.35 range. Whales step in At the same time, on-chain flows show fresh capital rather than recycled liquidity. Notably, a newly created wallet withdrew $23.51 million in USDC from centralised exchanges and bought 466,000 HYPE worth $21.45 million, while also accumulating $2.16 million in UFART. 余烬 @EmberCN · Follow 一个新创建地址在过去 6 小时里购买了 46.6 万枚 $HYPE ($2145 万)。这个地址在凌晨创建后从 Binance 跟 Crypto. com 提取了 2351 万 USDC 然后存进 Hyperliquid，购买了 46.6 万枚 $HYPE ($2145 万，价格 $45.69) 和 216 万枚 $UFART ($214 万，价格 $1.02)。地址： hypurrscan.io/address/0xa523… 6:03 AM · Aug 15, 2025 9 Reply Copy link Read 5 replies Additionally, Arthur Hayes has purchased a substantial amount of HYPE tokens. Lookonchain @lookonchain · Follow Arthur Hayes( @CryptoHayes ) bought more $HYPE , $LDO , and $ENA today.Over the past 5 days, Arthur Hayes has purchased a total of 1,750 $ETH ($7.43M), 58,631 $HYPE ($2.62M), 3.1M $ENA ($2.48M), 1.29M $LDO ($1.83M), 184,610 $PENDLE ($1.02M), and 420,000 $ETHFI ($516.6K). 11:26 AM · Aug 15, 2025 589 Reply Copy link Read 51 replies Therefore, whale participation now aligns with the platform’s volume surge, which often precedes continuation moves in trending markets. Liquidity and institutional tailwinds Beyond price, underlying liquidity continues to improve. Hyperliquid’s TVL has climbed from about $460 million in mid-July to roughly $610 million, while July USD inflows jumped from $21.35 million in June to $349.27 million. Moreover, Circle’s plan to bring native USDC and CCTP V2 to Hyperliquid, along with Anchorage Digital Bank’s custody support for HYPE, strengthens on- and off-ramps for both retail and institutions. Momentum tilt on the chart From a technical point of view, the recent breakout from a downward channel, after weeks of compression, and a fresh ascending trendline argue for continuation if buyers defend higher lows. Furthermore, major moving averages from the 50-day SMA down to the 20-day EMA point to a buy bias, while the RSI sits near 63, which leaves room before overbought territory. Hyperliquid price chart | Source: TradingView Additionally, the MACD remains positive, and the stochastic indicator near 87.81 signals firm buying interest, even as the Bollinger Bands tighten and the price rides the upper band. Hyperliquid price forecast: the path to $50 Given the confluence of record platform activity, whale accumulation, and bullish technicals, the base case favours an attempt at $50 and a test of $52. A daily close above $49.75 with expanding volume and persistent fee strength would likely validate a move toward $55 in the short run. However, if price stalls beneath $48 and breadth fades, the market could consolidate between $44 and $49 while rebuilding energy. The post Hyperliquid price forecast: Can it break past $50 as it sets a new ATH? appeared first on Invezz

title: Coinbase Sees Early Signs of Altcoin Season Ahead
body: Coinbase’s suspicion is fueled by Bitcoin dominance dropping from 65% to 59%, rising altcoin market capitalization, and expectations of a September Fed rate cut that could unleash retail capital into high-risk assets. Historical signals, like Bitcoin dominance’s first monthly bearish cross since January of 2021, add weight to the bullish case. Ethereum is leading the charge, with US spot ETH ETFs pulling in over $3 billion in the first half of August, including a record $1 billion in a single day. ETH prices surged nearly 20% this week, topping $4,765, as institutional inflows hit record highs. Altseason Buzz Builds Coinbase suggested that current market conditions could be setting the stage for a full-scale altcoin season as early as September, with certain key indicators already pointing toward a potential shift in momentum away from Bitcoin. In its latest monthly outlook, David Duong, Coinbase Institutional’s global head of research, said that the firm defines an altcoin season as a period in which at least 75% of the top 50 altcoins by market capitalization outperform Bitcoin over a 90-day period. While this threshold has not been reached just yet, several factors suggest the market is moving in that direction. Coinbase monthly outlook One of the main drivers is the large amount of retail capital that is currently parked in money market funds. Duong argued that the Federal Reserve’s expected September interest rate cut— odds of which have climbed to 92% after the latest Consumer Price Index data showing inflation steady at 2.7%—could unlock more retail participation in crypto markets. A lower interest rate environment typically boosts high-risk assets like altcoins by drawing in fresh liquidity. Bitcoin’s market dominance also fell from over 65% in May to around 59%, its lowest since January. Duong said this decline signals the early stages of capital rotation into altcoins. Other traders like Ito Shimotsuma noticed that Bitcoin dominance just formed its first monthly bearish cross since January of 2021. Back then, altcoins rallied for four months after the signal, and a similar move could trigger gains through December 2025. (Source: Coinbase) Additionally, altcoin market capitalization surged by over 50% since early July, and while altcoin season indexes from CoinMarketCap, Blockchain Center, and CryptoRank are still below the 75 threshold, they have been steadily rising. Institutional interest in Ethereum is playing a major role in driving momentum, supported by stablecoin adoption and digital asset treasuries. However, Joanna Liang of venture capital firm Jsquare explained that the market still awaits a strong new narrative to fully ignite altseason, similar to how ICOs, Layer-1 blockchains, and DeFi/NFT booms fueled past cycles. With the supportive macroeconomic backdrop, falling Bitcoin dominance, and a compelling narrative converge, analysts believe a mature altcoin season could emerge over the next few months. Ethereum ETFs Head for Record-Breaking Month On altcoin that is picking up steam is Ethereum. In fact, spot Ethereum exchange-traded funds (ETFs) in the United States attracted over $3 billion in net inflows in just the first two weeks of August, setting the stage for their second-strongest monthly performance since launch. Data shows that spot Ethereum ETFs are on track to record their strongest week ever, with inflows exceeding $2.9 billion. The momentum has been particularly strong this week, averaging over $700 million in daily inflows since Monday. Monday alone saw a record-setting $1 billion in inflows, which was the highest single-day figure for the asset class. ETH ETF flows (Source: Farside Investors ) The surge in ETF demand took place alongside a robust rally in ETH’s price this month. On Thursday, ETH climbed to a yearly high of $4,765.83 before experiencing a sharp drop below $4,500, only to recover and trade above $4,600 at press time. This means that ETH was able to climb by nearly 20% throughout the past week. The wave of capital also pushed total net assets across all spot Ethereum ETFs to a record $29.22 billion. ETH price action over the past week (Source: CoinMarketCap ) Since their launch, spot Ethereum ETFs accumulated $12.73 billion in cumulative net inflows and are on pace for a five-month inflow streak heading into September. Thursday’s trading day alone brought in $639.61 million, led by BlackRock’s iShares Ethereum Trust (ETHA) with $519.68 million, followed by the Grayscale Ethereum Mini Trust with over $60 million and Fidelity’s Ethereum Fund with nearly $57 million. This week’s strong performance follows Wednesday’s $729 million in net inflows, which was the second-highest daily inflow for spot Ethereum ETFs after Monday’s record. With Ethereum’s price surging and institutional demand climbing, market strategy firm Fundstrat is turning increasingly bullish. Chief information officer Thomas Lee described ETH as the “biggest macro trade” of the next decade, while head of digital asset research Sean Farrell projected the asset could reach between $12,000 and $15,000 by the end of 2025.

Conclusion Nexchain’s $5 million airdrop, live public testnet, and progressing presale crypto phase provide multiple ways for participants to get involved before the mainnet. title: Zelensky Calls for Peace: Urgent Plea for US Support Sparks Hope
body: BitcoinWorld Zelensky Calls for Peace: Urgent Plea for US Support Sparks Hope Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has made a poignant and direct appeal: Zelensky calls for peace , urging an immediate end to the conflict. His recent statement on X, shared by Walter Bloomberg’s economic news account, underscores Ukraine’s critical dependence on the United States to achieve this vital goal. This urgent plea resonates across global headlines, highlighting the immense stakes involved. Understanding Zelensky’s Urgent Plea for Peace President Zelensky’s direct message, “it’s time to end the war,” is more than just a statement; it’s a profound call to action. Ukraine faces immense challenges, and the urgency behind this plea reflects the human cost and the desire for stability. The world watches closely as discussions around Ukraine conflict resolution intensify. Why is this moment so crucial? The ongoing conflict continues to exact a heavy toll on human lives and infrastructure. Therefore, a clear and decisive push for peace becomes paramount. Why is US Aid to Ukraine So Crucial? The United States has been a significant supporter of Ukraine since the full-scale invasion began. But why is continued US aid to Ukraine considered indispensable for ending the war? Military Support: Provides essential defensive capabilities and equipment. Financial Assistance: Helps maintain critical government functions and services. Diplomatic Leverage: Strengthens Ukraine’s position in international negotiations. This support is not merely transactional; it is viewed as a cornerstone for achieving lasting peace and stability in the region. Without it, the path to a resolution becomes significantly more challenging. What Does Ending the War in Ukraine Entail? Achieving a complete cessation of hostilities and a sustainable peace requires complex negotiations and sustained international effort. To end the war in Ukraine , various factors must align, including diplomatic breakthroughs, security guarantees, and humanitarian considerations. The path forward is intricate, demanding collective resolve from all parties involved. This process will likely involve multiple stages, from immediate ceasefire agreements to long-term reconstruction plans. Every step requires careful coordination and unwavering commitment from the international community. The Broader Impact of Global Peace Efforts The conflict in Ukraine has ripple effects far beyond its borders, influencing global energy markets, food security, and geopolitical alliances. Therefore, successful global peace efforts in Ukraine could pave the way for increased stability worldwide. Conversely, prolonged conflict can continue to destabilize economies and foster uncertainty, impacting everything from supply chains to investor confidence. A more peaceful world often correlates with greater economic predictability. This stability is beneficial for all sectors, including the broader financial landscape. What Are the Challenges Ahead for Ukraine Conflict Resolution? Despite the strong desire for peace, significant hurdles remain. These include: Differing objectives among belligerents. The need for robust international guarantees. Reconstruction and humanitarian aid requirements. These complexities highlight why President Zelensky’s call for peace is so timely and why continued international solidarity, especially US aid to Ukraine , is paramount. The ultimate goal is a just and lasting peace that respects Ukraine’s sovereignty and territorial integrity. Conclusion: President Zelensky’s powerful call for peace serves as a stark reminder of the ongoing human tragedy and the urgent need for a resolution. With Ukraine’s future deeply intertwined with sustained international backing, particularly from the United States, the focus remains firmly on diplomatic solutions and continued support to end the war in Ukraine . The global community hopes for a swift and equitable conclusion to this devastating conflict, allowing for recovery and renewed stability. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 1. Why did President Zelensky issue this specific call now? President Zelensky’s call comes amid ongoing intense fighting and as international attention, particularly from the U.S., remains crucial for continued support. It underscores the critical need for a definitive resolution. 2. How does US support specifically help Ukraine? US support encompasses vital military aid, financial assistance to sustain government functions, and diplomatic backing, all of which are indispensable for Ukraine’s defense and its ability to negotiate a peaceful resolution. 3. What are the biggest obstacles to ending the war? Major obstacles include differing objectives between the warring parties, the need for robust international security guarantees for Ukraine, and the immense challenges of post-conflict reconstruction and humanitarian aid. 4. How might an end to the conflict impact global stability? A peaceful resolution to the Ukraine conflict would significantly enhance global stability, potentially easing economic pressures on energy and food markets, and fostering a more predictable international geopolitical landscape. 5. Is there a timeline for Ukraine conflict resolution? There is no definitive timeline for Ukraine conflict resolution . Achieving peace is a complex process dependent on ongoing diplomatic efforts, military developments, and sustained international cooperation. If you found this article insightful, please consider sharing it with your network on social media. Spreading awareness about these critical global events helps foster informed discussions and understanding. To learn more about the latest explore our article on key developments shaping global geopolitical stability and its impact on financial markets. This post Zelensky Calls for Peace: Urgent Plea for US Support Sparks Hope first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: BlackRock just bought $1 billion of these two cryptocurrencies
body: On August 14, spot Ethereum ETFs recorded a staggering $640 million in net inflows, with BlackRock ( ETHA ) leading the charge contributing $520 million. U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs were also on a roll, as BlackRock ( IBIT ) again dominated with daily inflows of $523.74 million. Fidelity ( FBTC ) and Ark ( ARKB ), however, saw $113.47 million and $149.92 million in daily outflows, respectively, accompanied by Bitwise , which reported a $30.87 million loss. Adjusting for outflows, U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs saw a total increase of $230.93 million, while Ethereum ETFs gained no less than $230.93 million on the day. ETH spot ETF inflows. Source: SoSo Value On August 14 (ET), U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs saw a net inflow of $231 million, led by BlackRock’s IBIT with $524 million. Ethereum spot ETFs recorded a $640 million net inflow, with BlackRock’s ETHA contributing $520 million. https://t.co/Tvs2oCSxTg pic.twitter.com/XAJfRaBuBa — Wu Blockchain (@WuBlockchain) August 15, 2025 BlackRock now holds more than $100 billion in crypto BlackRock has reached a new milestone in its digital asset strategy, its cryptocurrency holdings now totaling $103.98 billion . The firm’s portfolio is still dominated by Bitcoin, with over 774,000 BTC in its holdings worth around $89 billion, alongside 3.2 million ETH worth nearly $15 billion. !function(e,n,i,s){var d="InfogramEmbeds";var o=e.getElementsByTagName(n)[0];if(window[d]&&window[d].initialized)window[d].process&&window[d].process();else if(!e.getElementById(i)){var r=e.createElement(n);r.async=1,r.id=i,r.src=s,o.parentNode.insertBefore(r,o)}}(document,"script","infogram-async","https://e.infogram.com/js/dist/embed-loader-min.js"); At the start of the year, BlackRock held roughly 1.07 million ETH worth $3.59 billion. title: Chainlink (LINK) Withdrawal: Stunning $10.2M Move from Binance by New Wallet
body: BitcoinWorld Chainlink (LINK) Withdrawal: Stunning $10.2M Move from Binance by New Wallet A significant event recently captured the attention of the cryptocurrency community: a new wallet executed a substantial Chainlink (LINK) withdrawal from the Binance exchange. This particular transaction involved a staggering 455,298 LINK tokens, valued at approximately $10.2 million, moved within a short four-hour window. This LINK whale transaction , as reported by blockchain analytics firm Lookonchain, immediately sparked discussions about its potential implications for the broader crypto market. Understanding such large movements is crucial for anyone tracking digital asset trends, as they often signal shifts in investor sentiment or strategic positioning. What Does a Large Chainlink (LINK) Withdrawal Signify? When a newly created wallet undertakes a substantial Chainlink (LINK) withdrawal , it’s more than just a simple transfer of funds. This action often indicates what is known as “whale activity” in the crypto space, specifically a LINK whale transaction in this context. Whales are individuals or entities holding large amounts of a particular cryptocurrency, and their movements can significantly influence market dynamics. For instance, moving tokens off an exchange generally suggests an intent to hold them for the long term, rather than sell them immediately. Conversely, depositing large amounts onto an exchange might precede a sell-off. Accumulation: The wallet owner might be accumulating LINK for a long-term investment strategy, believing in Chainlink’s future growth and its role in decentralized oracle networks. Security: Moving funds from a centralized exchange to a private wallet enhances security, as the user gains full control over their private keys, mitigating exchange-related risks. Over-the-Counter (OTC) Deals: Large withdrawals can sometimes precede an OTC transaction, where a buyer and seller agree on a price directly, bypassing public exchanges to avoid significant price slippage. Analyzing Binance LINK Movements: Is There a Pattern? The recent Binance LINK movements highlight the constant flow of assets on and off major exchanges. Binance, being one of the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchanges, frequently sees significant transactions. However, a single large withdrawal by a newly formed wallet often stands out. It prompts analysts to investigate the wallet’s history, if any, and its subsequent actions. While the immediate reason for this specific large crypto withdrawals remains speculative without further data, observing such patterns helps in understanding potential market shifts. Investors often monitor exchange balances and large transfers as indicators of supply and demand. A decrease in exchange supply due to significant withdrawals can, in theory, reduce selling pressure and potentially lead to price appreciation if demand remains constant or increases. However, it’s vital to remember that one transaction alone does not dictate the entire market trend. The overall crypto market impact depends on various factors, including broader market sentiment, news, and macroeconomic conditions. The Potential Impact of Large Crypto Withdrawals on LINK Price The immediate effect of a large crypto withdrawals on an asset’s price can be subtle or pronounced, depending on market conditions. For Chainlink (LINK), a $10.2 million withdrawal represents a notable sum, yet it’s a fraction of its total market capitalization. Nevertheless, such moves can influence short-term sentiment. If other whales follow suit, or if the market perceives this as a bullish signal for LINK, it could contribute to positive price momentum. Consider these aspects regarding the LINK price impact : Reduced Selling Pressure: Tokens moved off exchanges are typically not intended for immediate sale, thus reducing the available supply on trading platforms. Investor Confidence: Large holders accumulating an asset can signal confidence, potentially encouraging other investors. Liquidity Changes: While the overall market liquidity might not drastically change, the liquidity on Binance specifically for LINK might see a minor adjustment. However, the market is complex. Other factors, such as overall crypto market trends, regulatory news, or Chainlink-specific developments, could easily outweigh the impact of a single withdrawal. Navigating the Crypto Market Impact: What Should Investors Consider? For investors, understanding these large transactions is part of staying informed about the crypto market impact . While a significant Chainlink (LINK) withdrawal might seem like a direct signal, it’s crucial to approach such events with a balanced perspective. Instead of reacting impulsively, consider these actionable insights: Due Diligence: Always conduct your own research. Don’t rely solely on whale movements as a definitive buy or sell signal. Long-Term Vision: Focus on Chainlink’s fundamentals, its technology, adoption, and development roadmap rather than short-term price fluctuations driven by large transactions. Risk Management: Diversify your portfolio and never invest more than you can afford to lose. Volatility is inherent in the crypto space. Stay Informed: Follow reputable analytics firms and news sources to gain a comprehensive understanding of market dynamics and Binance LINK movements . This substantial Chainlink (LINK) withdrawal from Binance by a new wallet serves as a reminder of the dynamic nature of the crypto markets. While the immediate reasons remain speculative, such large movements underscore the ongoing activity by significant holders. They highlight the importance of monitoring on-chain data for insights into potential market trends and investor behavior. Ultimately, a well-informed and strategic approach remains paramount for navigating the complexities of the digital asset landscape. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 1. What is a Chainlink (LINK) withdrawal? A Chainlink (LINK) withdrawal refers to the act of moving LINK tokens from a cryptocurrency exchange, like Binance, to a private wallet or another address. This action typically means the owner intends to hold the tokens rather than sell them immediately on the exchange. 2. Why do whales withdraw large amounts of crypto from exchanges? Whales, or large holders, withdraw significant amounts of crypto for various reasons, including long-term accumulation, enhanced security by self-custody, or preparing for an over-the-counter (OTC) transaction that bypasses public exchanges. 3. How does a large withdrawal affect LINK’s price? A large withdrawal can potentially reduce the available supply of LINK on exchanges, which might decrease selling pressure. If demand remains constant or increases, this could contribute to positive price momentum, though it’s rarely the sole factor. 4. Is this Chainlink (LINK) withdrawal a bullish or bearish signal? Generally, large withdrawals are considered a bullish signal as they suggest an intent to hold rather than sell. However, the crypto market is complex, and one transaction does not definitively indicate a trend. It’s crucial to consider broader market conditions and other factors. 5. How can I track large crypto transactions like this? You can track large crypto transactions using blockchain analytics platforms like Lookonchain (as mentioned in the article), Whale Alert, or other on-chain data providers that monitor significant movements of cryptocurrencies. title: Altcoin season by mohla začať už v septembri. Pripravte sa na ňu s týmito coinmi
body: Podľa najnovšieho mesačného výhľadu od Coinbase Institutional, altcoin season môže prísť už niekoľko týždňov . Prognóza je taka, že k zmene trhového lídra z Bitcoinu na alternatívne kryptomeny by mohlo dôjsť už v septembri. Pojem altcoin sezóna označuje obdobie na trhu, keď kryptomeny iné než Bitcoin, často na čele s Ethereum, Solana a ďalšími veľkými tokenmi, dosahujú počas dlhšieho časového úseku výrazne vyššie percentuálne zisky než $BTC. Dôvody, prečo altcoin season môže začať už v septembri Správa zo 14. augusta , ktorej autorom je David Duong , vedúci výskumu v Coinbase, uvádza tri hlavné faktory, prečo altcoin season môže začať už v septembri: klesajúcu dominanciu Bitcoinu, zvyšujúcu sa likviditu a rastúcu ochotu investorov presúvať kapitál do aktív s vyššou volatilitou. Duong tento vývoj opisuje ako cyklický presun kapitálu smerom k rizikovejším aktívam, ku ktorému dochádza, keď na trhu rastie dôvera. Dominancia B itcoinu – teda jeho podiel na celkovej trhovej hodnote kryptomien, začal oslabovať. Coinbase upozorňuje, že keď tento ukazovateľ klesá, kapitál sa presúva najskôr do veľkých altcoinov a následne do stredných a menších projektov. Tento rotačný efekt by sa podľa nich mohol naplno prejaviť už v septembri. Likvidita altcoinov – Coinbase poukazuje na užšie rozdiely medzi nákupnou a predajnou cenou a na hlbšie order booky na hlavných burzách, čo uľahčuje obchodníkom vstup a výstup z pozícií bez výraznej straty na cene. Vyššia likvidita zároveň priťahuje aj väčších hráčov, ktorí by sa inak menej obchodovaným tokenom vyhýbali. Trhový sentiment – Duong tvrdí, že pri stabilizácii makroekonomických podmienok sú investori ochotnejší hľadať vyššie výnosy v rizikovejších kryptoaktívach. Takéto prostredie môže podporiť trvalý prílev kapitálu do altcoinov, najmä ak sa cena bitcoinu bude konsolidovať namiesto prudkého rastu na nové maximá. Zdroj: Coinbase Monthly Outlook Ak sa prognózy Coinbase naplnia a altcoin season skutočne odštartuje už v septembri, môžeme očakávať, že na trh sa dostanú do popredia nielen tradiční lídri ako Ethereum či Solana, ale aj nové a kreatívne projekty, ktoré dokážu zaujať odlišným prístupom. V čase rastúcej ochoty investorov hľadať vyššie výnosy práve medzi altcoinmi , majú šancu zažiariť aj menej známe, no výrazne odlíšiteľné tokeny. Satirický altcoin, ktorý sa vysmieva trhovým štandardom Token6900 prichádza na kryptomenový trh ako odvážny a nekompromisný protiklad tradičných investičných postupov. Od prvej chvíle dáva jasne najavo, že nemá ambíciu predstierať praktické využitie či fundamentálnu hodnotu. Naopak, otvorene priznáva, že jeho existencia je postavená na ironickom pohľade na súčasný kryptotrh. Zdroj: token6900.com Projekt čerpá z nostalgie a úmyselne absurdného konceptu, ktorý odmieta komplikované plány a technické sľuby. V čase, keď sa mnohé kryptomeny snažia maskovať svoju špekulatívnu podstatu za veľkolepé vízie, Token6900 stavia na transparentnosti a úplnej otvorenosti . Tým si získava komunitu, ktorá oceňuje úprimnosť a nehrá sa na „revolučný projekt budúcnosti“. Tokenomika je jednoduchá a zrozumiteľná. Až 80 % celkovej ponuky tokenov bude sprístupnených počas predpredaja , pričom maximálny objem investícií je stanovený na 5 miliónov dolárov . Celková zásoba tokenov je pevne limitovaná a projekt neumožňuje žiadne dodatočné mintovanie. To zaručuje stabilný počet tokenov na trhu, čo môže pri zvýšenom záujme podporiť ich cenu. Do predpredaja sa môžete zapojiť na oficiálnej stránke projektu výmenou za kryptomeny alebo platobnou kartou. Za jeden token aktuálne zaplatíte 0,006975 $ . Vďaka svojej odlišnej charakteristike ho radíme medzi altcoiny, ktoré môžu v septembri 2025 zaznamenať výrazné zhodnotenie. Využiť zvýhodnenú cenu tokenov $T6900 Maxi Doge – nový altcoin s poriadnou dávkou energie Medzi altcoiny, ktoré si zaslúžia vašu pozornosť, patrí aj projekt Maxi Doge ($MAXI) . Tento nováčik nadväzuje na popularitu legendárneho Dogecoinu, no pridáva mu štipku energie a netradičný koncept – hlavným symbolom je totiž psí kulturista. Tým sa odlišuje od bežných meme coinov a oslovuje nielen fanúšikov krypta, ale aj priaznivcov fitness a aktívneho životného štýlu. Zdroj: maxidogetoken.com Maxi Doge stavia na overenom recepte, ktorý poznáme od projektov ako Dogecoin či Shiba Inu – silná a lojálna komunita, vtipná vizuálna identita a virálny marketing . Pridanou hodnotou je dôraz na interakciu s fanúšikmi a ich zapájanie do rôznych aktivít. Vývojári otvorene deklarujú, že projekt má byť nielen investíciou, ale aj miestom, kde prevláda komunita s pozitívnou energiou. Token $MAXI si v súčasnosti môžete doplniť za 0,000252 $ . Tí, ktorí do projektu vstúpia už teraz, majú možnosť uzamknúť svoje tokeny výmenou za stakingové odmeny vo výške 280 % APY . V staking poole je uzamknutých už viac ako 2,6 miliardy tokenov. Okrem klasického marketingu developeri plánujú aj rôzne súťaže, výzvy a online eventy, ktoré majú zvyšovať povedomie o značke. Kompletný plán rozvoja a dlhodobú víziu nájdete vo whitepaperi alebo na oficiálnom profile Maxi Doge na platforme X (Twitter). Zapojte sa do predpredaja $MAXI ešte dnes Záver Podľa prognóz Coinbase by sa altcoin season mohla začať už v septembri. Prípadný presun kapitálu z Bitcoinu do altcoinov by mohol viesť k obdobiu, keď tieto aktíva zaznamenajú vyššie zhodnotenie, no ďalší vývoj bude závisieť najmä od makroekonomických podmienok a celkovej nálady investorov na trhu.

title: Swedish Investment Company Issues Stock to Buy Bitcoin! Here Are the Details
body: Bitcoin Treasury Capital announced today that it has conducted a “directed share issuance” of approximately 4 million Swedish kronor (SEK). Bitcoin Treasury Capital Accelerates Bitcoin Uptake with SEK 4 Million Share Issuance 13,803 Type B shares issued based on the authorization received at the Extraordinary General Assembly held on June 4, 2025, were sold to an existing shareholder and external investor group. The issuance price of the shares was set at SEK 287 per share, which is the company's closing price on the Spotlight Stock Market on August 14, 2025. All issued shares were allocated to investors, and the proceeds from the sale will be used entirely to purchase new Bitcoin. The company stated that thanks to this transaction, it achieved a rapid capital inflow at a price above its net asset value (NAV), thus increasing the amount of Bitcoin per share, which will benefit both the company and its shareholders. “We are increasing our acquisition pace with a single goal: to grow the amount of Bitcoin per share and, consequently, shareholder value. Every Bitcoin we add strengthens our market position and supports our long-term growth objectives,” said BTC AB CEO Christoffer De Geer. BTC AB, which invests entirely in Bitcoin, aims to create value for its shareholders and become the most transparent and investor-friendly public company in the industry. The company emphasizes its commitment to corporate-level security and operational excellence standards. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Swedish Investment Company Issues Stock to Buy Bitcoin! Here Are the Details

title: Tyler Winklevoss Urges President Donald Trump to Support Open Banking
body: Over 80 crypto-related businesses jointly urge President Trump to block anti-competitive practices by major banks. JPMorgan is set to implement a fee of $300 million per year in September for emerging businesses to access customers’ data. Market analysts have argued that traditional banks have found a new way to reintroduce Operation Chockpoint 2.0. Gemini co-founder Tyler Winklevoss has signed a letter by the Financial Technology Association (FTA) urging President Donald Trump to support open banking. Winklevoss joined more than 80 Chief Executive Officers (CEOs) in signing the letter as major banks, led by JPMorgan Chase & Co. (NYSE: JPM), plan to implement anti-competitive measures in September 2025. According to Winklevoss , banks should not be able to trap customers’ funds and data, since it is a basic human right. Consequently, the pro-innovation leaders urged President Trump to use executive powers to block the intended move, which may reintroduce chokepoint 2.0. “We urge you to use the full power of your office and the broader Administration to prevent the largest institutions from raising new barriers to financial freedom. This is fundamentally… The post Tyler Winklevoss Urges President Donald Trump to Support Open Banking appeared first on Coin Edition .

title: U.S. Crypto Capital: SEC Chair Unveils Bold Plan for Global Dominance
body: BitcoinWorld U.S. Crypto Capital: SEC Chair Unveils Bold Plan for Global Dominance The United States is setting its sights on a monumental goal: becoming the undisputed U.S. crypto capital of the world. This ambitious vision, articulated by U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) Chair Paul Atkins, signals a significant shift in the nation’s approach to digital assets. Atkins recently told Fox Business that the SEC will deploy every available resource to establish the U.S. as the premier Bitcoin hub and leader in the broader cryptocurrency landscape. What is ‘Project Crypto’ All About? On July 31, the SEC officially launched “Project Crypto,” a strategic initiative designed to propel the U.S. to the forefront of the digital asset revolution. This project directly supports U.S. President Donald Trump’s vision of making the nation the global center for cryptocurrency innovation . The core idea behind Project Crypto is to foster an environment where digital assets can thrive responsibly, attracting investment and talent from across the globe. Resource Allocation: The SEC Chair emphasized deploying all available agency resources to achieve this goal. Strategic Alignment: Project Crypto aligns with the broader national objective of economic and technological leadership. Innovation Focus: The initiative prioritizes creating a fertile ground for new technologies and business models in the crypto space. Moreover, this move suggests a proactive stance from the SEC, aiming to shape the future of digital finance rather than merely reacting to it. It’s about building a robust framework that supports growth while safeguarding market integrity. Why Aim to Be the Premier U.S. Crypto Capital? Establishing the U.S. as the leading U.S. crypto capital offers numerous benefits, not just for the digital asset industry but for the entire economy. A strong domestic crypto sector can lead to significant economic growth, creating new jobs, attracting foreign investment, and fostering technological advancements. Think about the potential for groundbreaking startups, increased financial inclusion, and enhanced global competitiveness. The vision extends beyond mere economic gains. It also encompasses solidifying the U.S. position as a global financial powerhouse in the digital age. By becoming a definitive Bitcoin hub , the nation can influence global standards and ensure that future financial systems are built on principles that reflect American values of transparency and innovation. Navigating Challenges for U.S. Cryptocurrency Innovation While the ambition to become the global U.S. crypto capital is inspiring, the path forward is not without its challenges. The primary hurdle involves striking the right balance between fostering cryptocurrency innovation and implementing effective regulatory oversight. The SEC, led by the SEC Chair , must navigate complex issues such as consumer protection, market manipulation prevention, and anti-money laundering efforts. Furthermore, competition from other nations eager to attract crypto businesses remains fierce. Jurisdictions in Europe and Asia are also actively developing their own crypto-friendly frameworks. Therefore, the U.S. must ensure its regulatory environment is clear, predictable, and encourages rather than stifles growth. Implications for the Global Bitcoin Hub The success of “Project Crypto” could profoundly impact the global digital asset market, especially for Bitcoin. As the U.S. solidifies its position as a trusted Bitcoin hub , it could lead to increased institutional adoption and greater liquidity for the world’s largest cryptocurrency. This could, in turn, enhance market stability and reduce volatility, making digital assets more appealing to a broader range of investors. Ultimately, a clear and supportive regulatory framework from the SEC Chair could unlock massive potential for the entire ecosystem. It could encourage more companies to build, invest, and operate within the U.S., accelerating the mainstream adoption of digital currencies and blockchain technology. The U.S. SEC’s “Project Crypto” represents a bold and strategic move to cement the nation’s role as the global U.S. crypto capital . With a clear focus on fostering cryptocurrency innovation and establishing a robust Bitcoin hub , the initiative aims to leverage the full resources of the SEC. While challenges exist, the potential benefits for economic growth, technological leadership, and global financial influence are substantial. This proactive approach by SEC Chair Paul Atkins could truly redefine the future of digital assets worldwide, making the U.S. a beacon for the burgeoning crypto economy. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is the main goal of “Project Crypto”? The main goal of “Project Crypto” is to establish the U.S. as the world’s leading U.S. crypto capital and premier hub for cryptocurrency innovation , fulfilling President Donald Trump’s vision. Who is leading this initiative at the SEC? U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) Chair Paul Atkins is leading this initiative, aiming to deploy all available resources to achieve the stated goals. How might this impact the Bitcoin market? By establishing the U.S. as a robust Bitcoin hub , “Project Crypto” could lead to increased institutional adoption, greater liquidity, and enhanced market stability for Bitcoin. What are the primary challenges for the U.S. in becoming the global crypto capital? Key challenges include balancing innovation with regulatory oversight, ensuring consumer protection, preventing market manipulation, and competing with other nations for crypto business attraction. Will “Project Crypto” affect all cryptocurrencies or just Bitcoin? While Bitcoin is mentioned as a key focus, the initiative aims to foster broader cryptocurrency innovation , implying benefits and regulatory frameworks for the entire digital asset ecosystem. Did you find this article insightful? Share it with your network on social media to spread the word about the U.S.’s ambitious crypto plans! title: Consumers bear huge bills as Google and Big Tech's energy demands soar
body: Tech firms like Google, Microsoft, and Amazon are increasingly taking a keen interest in energy matters as their data centers push up electricity bills for citizens. When utilities regulators met in Anaheim in November last year, tech firms were a prominent presence as delegates donned Google-branded lanyards while Microsoft and Amazon sponsored networking activities and led panel discussions, respectively. Apparently, Amazon and Microsoft are already repurposing old energy plants in Europe to power AI needs. Data centers drain energy, impacting domestic consumers This strong presence shows a significant shift as firms that used to be solely focused on digital services are now heavily involved in energy markets. In 2023, the power-draining data centers consumed about 4% of America’s generated electricity. Within three years from today, government analysis suggests this might reach about 12%. Amazon CEO Andy Jassy has acknowledged the challenge, saying energy is the biggest constraint, a problem that is also piling pressure on households. A decisive confrontation occurred last December in Columbus. Technology companies, including Amazon, Google and Microsoft submitted an unprecedented independent proposal to utility regulator PUCO, seeking reduced infrastructure payments for their planned data centers. This followed American Electric Power’s warning that servicing 90 new facilities would need six times Ohio’s current output. The utility had also indicated that households would end up battling the high costs of energy without serious upfront planning. However, the commissioners, after months of deliberation, unanimously turned down the technology firm’s proposal. PUCO chair Jenifer French stated the ruling “safeguards non-data-centre customers” by creating a new rate classification. The immediate effect is clear: typical Ohio bills rose by at least $15 monthly from June. Northern Virginia exemplifies long-term consumer risks. In 2010, developer Unicorn Interests secured approval for a Manassas data center requiring $42 million (£33 million) in grid upgrades. When the project was delayed four years, residents absorbed maintenance costs for unused infrastructure. Google and other tech firms balance innovation and equity Technology companies found themselves in dual roles. While data centers drive unprecedented electricity demand, their energy subsidiaries have sold $2.7 billion (£2.1 billion) of power since 2015. Microsoft energy chief Bobby Hollis insists: “We don’t want to see other customers bearing the cost.” Yet, traditional utilities recover infrastructure investments through decades of consumer billing. The technology companies say they are open to compromises. In an interview, Amanda Peterson Corio, a Google executive responsible for data center energy, pointed to a deal with American Electric Power’s subsidiary in Indiana and consumer groups in that state, where tech companies agreed to pay some grid upgrade costs upfront to allay concerns about canceled or delayed projects. But under that deal, data centers are not put into a new rate class. “You start to isolate different classes and start to allocate who we’re going to give power to and who we’re not,” Ms. Corio said. “That goes against every construct of how our electricity system was designed, which is to be open access.” Tech companies say they plan to keep building data centers, but where those sites will be is uncertain. That puts utilities at risk of building more than their area needs. Microsoft, for example, announced plans in October to build three data center campuses that would require power from the Ohio utility. But six months later — before regulators ruled against the tech industry — Microsoft changed its data center strategy and said it was putting the Ohio projects on ice. For the foreseeable future, those sites would remain farmland. Complicating matters, technology firms operate without the ownership restrictions facing utilities. With artificial intelligence’s expansion accelerating, the question remains how society distributes both its benefits and costs. Get up to $30,050 in trading rewards when you join Bybit today
